meanings.definition: An infectious bacterial fever with an eruption of red spots on the chest and abdomen and severe intestinal irritation.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with typhoid after observing the red spots on their chest.
meanings.sent2: The outbreak of typhoid in the village caused concern among the residents.
meanings.sent3: When the typhoid bacteria threw a party in the intestines, it was definitely uninvited!
meanings.sent4: The red spots of typhoid were like warning signs on a dangerous road.
meanings.sent5: The image of red spots from typhoid stayed vividly in the doctor's mind.

meanings.definition: A bacterial disease spread through contaminated food and water, causing high fever, headache, and intestinal inflammation.
meanings.sent1: Contaminated water was the source of the typhoid outbreak in the city.
meanings.sent2: The symptoms of typhoid include high fever and severe headache.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria causing typhoid decided to have a pool party in the contaminated water.
meanings.sent4: The spread of typhoid was like wildfire in the crowded neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The impact of typhoid on the community was unforgettable.
